name: A Series of Rude Awakenings
description:
A Series of Rude Awakenings is created by a small student team as a vehicle for learning Unity and C#. Our hope with this release is to garner feedback which in turn can help us improve on the game we are creating!

If you do us the honor of trying our game out, feel free to leave feedback and comments on your experience in a comment, or by participating in the short google forms survey linked below!
Including a link to a screenshot of your game over screen (run stats) with your survey entry is extra helpful but not required.

Survey Link: https://forms.gle/ctaYhnfHJQ7yyYMv9
